[INST] Who wrote the epic poem 'Gitanjali' for which he won the Nobel Prize in Literature? [/INST]

The epic poem 'Gitanjali' was written by Ravindranath Tagore, who won the Nobel Prize in Literature for his unique and poignant work. Their nationalism, mirrored in 'Gitanjali', impressed the Nobel committee, thus resulting in Tagore receiving the prestigious award.
Rabindranath Tagore
